certificationMarkTerms.title: Certificate mark terms question
certificationMarkTerms.instructions: You agree to the following terms:

accurateContactInformation.title: Accurate Contact Information
accurateContactInformation.term: I have provided OSHWA with accurate contact information, recognize that all official communications from OSHWA will be directed to that contact information, and will update that contact information as necessary.

complianceWithOfficialCertificationGuide.title: Compliance with Official Certification Guidelines
complianceWithOfficialCertificationGuide.term: I will only use the certification mark in compliance with official certification guidelines.

oshwaCertificationMark.title: OSHWA Certification Mark
oshwaCertificationMark.term: I acknowledge that all right, title, and interest in the certification mark remains with OSHWA.

violationsEnforcement.title: Violations Enforcement
violationsEnforcement.term: I acknowledge that OSHWA has the right to enforce violations of the use of the mark. This enforcement may involve financial penalties for misuse in bad faith.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.term: I have the ability to bind those responsible for the certified item to this agreement.

explanationCertificationTerms.title: If you do not agree with any of the above terms, please explain.
explanationCertificationTerms.requiredErrorMessage: This explanation is required if you did not agree to one or more of the above terms.

relationship.title: Relationship to certified item
relationship.formPlaceholder: Briefly describe your relationship to the certified item (e.g. 'I am the primary developer of the certified item.' or 'This is my personal project.')

agreementTerms.title: I agree to the terms of the OSHWA Open Source Hardware Certification Mark License Agreement, including the Requirements for Certification and Usage Guidelines incorporated by reference and including license terms that are not present in or conflict with this web form. I acknowledge that by agreeing to the terms of the OSHWA Open Source Hardware Certification Mark License Agreement that I am binding the entity listed to the License Agreement. I recognize that I will receive my unique identification number that allows me to promote my project as OSHWA Open Source Hardware Certified in compliance with the user guidelines via the email provided to OSHWA after submitting this form.
agreementTerms.requiredErrorMessage: You must agree to the terms of the OSHWA Open Source Hardware Certification Mark LIcense Agreement.

parentName.title: If you are the parent or legal guardian entering into this agreement on behalf of an individual under the age of 18, please provide your name to certify that you also agree to be bound by this agreement.
parentName.formPlaceholder: Enter name of parent or legal guardian
